text: Eduardo Gómez Manzano (27 July 1951 – 28 July 2019) was a Spanish actor and comedian. He was born in Madrid, Spain. He was known for his roles in Aquí no hay quien viva, La que se avecina and Butterfly's Tongue. Gómez died from laryngeal cancer in Madrid on 28 July 2019 at the age of 68.Muere Eduardo Gómez, actor de 'Aquí No Hay Quien Viva' y 'La Que Se Avecina', a los 68 años ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Aqui No Hay Quien Viva Web Portal at Antena 3 *Interview with Eduardo Gómez Category:1951 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from laryngeal cancer Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish comedians Category:Actors from Madrid
title: Eduardo Gómez
